definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Ge 26:21 well, pit, mostly Hex, Ge 23 t. Ex 1 t. Nu 5 t., 37 t. in all; Ar. biy’run, Aram. [[בְּאֵרָא]], [[בֵּיר]], [[בֵּירָא]], biro0, Sab. [[באר]] DHM:ZMG. 1875, 608, As. bêru, Lyon:Sargon 61 (connexion with above √ not clear; Lag:l. c. spring of water, as coming to light, appearing; possible, although meaning in use rather well, than spring; v. however, Ge 16:14 cf. v:Ge 16:7, Ge 26:19, Nu 21:17)—´[[בּ]] abs. Ge 21:30 +; cstr. Ge 21:19 +; sf. [[בְּאֵֶרָךָ]] Pr 5:15; Pl. abs. [[בְּאֵרׂת]] Ge 26:15; cstr. id. Ge 26:18; cf. [[בֶּאֱרׂת בֶּאֱרׂת חֵמָר]] Ge 14:10; —

a well, often as made by digging ([[חָפַר]]) Ge 21:25, Ge 21:30 (E), Ge 26:15, Ge 26:18, Ge 26:19, Ge 26:21, Ge 26:22, Ge 26:32 (all J), also poet. Nu 21:18 (+ [[כרה]]) vid. also v:Nu 21:16, v:Nu 21:17 (where the well addressed, in song, [[עֲלִי בְאֵר]]); also c. [[כרה]] in prose Ge 26:25; also with no ref. to its origin Ge 16:14 (J; ‖[[עַיִן]] v:Ge 16:7), Ge 29:2, Ex 2:15 (J) Nu 20:17, Nu 21:22 (E) 2Sa 17:18, 2Sa 17:21; [[מַיִם]]([[ה]])[[בְּאֵר ]] Ge 21:19 (E) Ge 24:11 (J; ‖[[עַיִן]] vv:Ge 24:13, vv:Ge 24:16, vv:Ge 24:43, vv:Ge 24:45); (cf. also Ge 21:25, Ge 26:18 supr. & esp. v:Ge 26:19 [[בְּאֵר מַיִם חַיִּים]]); water taken from it by drawing ([[שָׁאַב]]) Ge 24:11, Ge 24:20; flocks watered from it ([[הִשְׁקָה]] [[מִן־]]) Ge 29:2, Ge 29:3, Ge 29:8, Ge 29:10 (cf. esp. Ex 2:16 they drew, [[דלה]], and filled the troughs); also [[מִתּוֹךְ בְּאֵרֶָךָ]] …. [[שְׁתֵה מַיִם]] Pr 5:15 (‖[[בּוֹר]]); the opening called [[פִּי הַבְּאֵר]] Ge 29:2, Ge 29:3, Ge 29:3, Ge 29:8, Ge 29:10; cf. ´[[פְּנֵי הַבּ]] 2Sa 17:19 (rd. prob. [[פּי]] so Sam. Targum SyrVer Vulgate, cf. Dr); fig. of fresh delights of woman beloved Ct So 4:15 [[מַעְיַן גַּנִּים בְּאֵר מַיִם חַיִּים]] [[וְנוֹזְלִים מִן־לְבָנוֹן]].

pit (= [[בּוֹר]]); pits of bitumen Ge 14:10 (cf. supr.); [[בְּאֵר שַׁחַת]] Ps 55:24 pit of (the) grave; cf. Ps 69:16 [[וְאַל־תֶּאְטַר עָלַי בְּאֵר פִּיהָ]] and let not (the) pit shut its mouth over me (‖[[מְחוּלָה]]); fig. of strange woman [[בְּאֵר חָרָה]] a narrow pit, out of which rescue is difficult Pr 23:27 (‖[[שׁוּחָה]] [[עֲמֻקָּה]]).

definitions.title: n.pr.loc. a.
definitions.body: c. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. [[בְּאֵ֫רָה]] a station of Isr. in desert Nu 21:16, possibly = [[בְּאֵר אֵילִים]] Is 15:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: same form Ju Jdg 9:21, acc. to Euseb. Lag:Onom.238, 2nd ed. 250 8 miles north of Eleutheropolis; cf. Rob:BR i. 452 who comp. el-Bîreh, near Beth-shemesh.
